parameters.description: Title of the schedule (searches with LIKE)
parameters.name: title

parameters.description: Start time of the schedule (ISO8601 format, filter by schedules starting after this date)
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: End time of the schedule (ISO8601 format, filter by schedules ending before this date)
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Location of the schedule (searches with LIKE)
parameters.name: location

parameters.description: User ID assigned to the schedule
parameters.name: assigned_to

get.description: Get user email by user ID
get.summary: Get user email by user ID

all_day.description: Nullable field (represented by tinyint in SQL)
